statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Terraza coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${9.00} per pound with some Mexican Shade Grown coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${14.80} per pound to create \displaystyle{80} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${10.89} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound. pounds of Terraza coffee. pounds of Mexican Shade Grown coffee.
